contents.Text: Press enter to search or click the Search Button
The Search Bar supports Boolean expressions. You can mix them as follows:
The search bar, by default, performs a comprehensive search that includes the 'full path' of files and folders.
This means that if you search for the letter 'A', it will return results for both songs containing that letter and folders that include it as well
The reason for this is if you search a artists name and have a folder with the artists name all songs in it recursively will be returned
Example i have a structure like this: {/British/artist_here/song1.mp3}
If i search British it will get return all songs with British in the name and all songs inside the British folder
